items.title: Heads of UK Special Forces suppressed evidence of war crimes, officer tells inquiry
items.description: An officer tells the Independent Inquiry relating to Afghanistan UK Special Forces leadership was "very much suppressing" the allegations.

items.title: Tulip Siddiq MP given jail sentence in Bangladesh after trial in her absence
items.description: The former minister and niece of Bangladesh's ousted former leader, who received a two-year sentence, says the charges are politically motivated.

items.title: Man refuses to appear at court over train attacks
items.description: Anthony Williams is accused of the attempted murders of 13 people.

items.title: Chris Mason: Why, in my judgement, Reeves was misleading on one specific point
items.description: The Chancellor chose not to share some information on tax receipts in an unusual press conference, given before the Budget.

items.title: Weather warnings issued as month's worth of rain could fall in 24 hours
items.description: Parts of the UK could see a month's worth of rainfall in just one day.
